definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: For it is the day of the LORD's vengeance, and the year of recompences for the controversy of Zion.
sentences.chinese: 因耶和華有報仇之日，爲錫安的爭辯，有報應之年。

sentences.english: Blessed is the man whose strength is in thee; in whose heart are the ways of them.
sentences.chinese: 靠你有力量心中想往錫安大道的，這人便爲有福。

sentences.english: Ye-eah we wept, when we remembered zion.
sentences.chinese: 燁峯我們哭，當我們記住錫安。

sentences.english: From Zion, perfect in beauty, God shines forth.
sentences.chinese: 從全美的錫安中，神已經發光了。

sentences.english: Do good to Zion in your good pleasure, building up the walls of Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 求你隨你的美意善待錫安，建造耶路撒冷的城牆。

sentences.english: The elders of the Daughter of Zion sit on the ground in silence;
sentences.chinese: 錫安城的長老坐在地上默默無聲。

sentences.english: Fear not, daughter of Zion; behold, your King comes, sitting on a donkey's colt. '
sentences.chinese: 錫安的女兒，不要懼怕，看哪，你的王騎着驢駒來了。

sentences.english: They go from strength to strength, the God of gods will be seen in Zion.
sentences.chinese: 他們行走，力上加力，各自到錫安朝見神。

sentences.english: By the rivers of Babylon we sat and wept when we remembered Zion .
sentences.chinese: 他們曾在巴比倫的河邊坐下，一追想錫安就哭了。

sentences.english: 2 the Lord loves the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
sentences.chinese: 他愛錫安的門，勝於愛雅各一切的住處。

sentences.english: Deliverers will go up on Mount Zion to govern the mountains of Esau. And the kingdom will be the Lord's.
sentences.chinese: 必有拯救者上錫安山來統治以掃山，王位就歸永恆主。

sentences.english: Let the sons of Zion rejoice in their King.
sentences.chinese: 願錫安的民，因他們的王快樂。

sentences.english: Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.
sentences.chinese: 願恨惡錫安的，都蒙羞退後。

sentences.english: Her gates are sunk into the ground;
Out of Zion, the perfection of beauty, God hath shined.
sentences.chinese: 從全美的錫安中，神已經發光了。

definition: to pray on behalf of sb
the Last Supper (in the biblical Passion story)
variant of 帳篷|帐篷[zhang4 peng5]
